text: Phantom of the Paradise is a 1974 American rock musical horror comedy movie directed by Brian De Palma and is based on the novels of Gaston Leroux. It stars Rod Serling, William Finley, Paul Williams, Jessica Harper, Gerrit Graham. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was a box office failure and since become a cult movie and was nominated for one Oscar at the Academy Awards in 1975. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1970s American musical movies Category:1974 horror movies Category:1974 comedy-drama movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:American independent movies Category:1970s independent movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American monster movies Category:American satirical movies Category:Movies about composers Category:Movies directed by Brian De Palma Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies based on books Category:Cult movies Category:American comedy-drama movies
title: Phantom of the Paradise
